title: Ka'i' oxi' tzij pa ruwi' ri coronavirus
allTitles: {"cak":"Ka'i' oxi' tzij pa ruwi' ri coronavirus","en":"","es":"Sobre Coronavirus","zaw":"Yälguijch guichgaroore nani laa “coronavirus”"}
copyright: Copyright © 2021, Ministerio de Educación de Guatemala y USAID.
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: Forma parte de la serie de libros en idiomas mayas para el cuidado y prevención de contagios por coronavirus, incluye audio y preguntas de comprensión.

2.cak: Ka'i' oxi' tzij pa ruwi' ri coronavirus

3.cak: Ka'i' oxi' tzij pa ruwi' ri coronavirus

4.cak: Ka'i' oxi' tzij pa ruwi' ri coronavirus

5.cak: Ka'i' oxi' tzij pa ruwi' ri coronavirus

6.cak: Ka'i' oxi' tzij pa ruwi' ri coronavirus

10.cak: Tijonïk pa ka'i' Ch'ab'äl pa ka'i' B'anob'äl

11.cak: Ri k'atzinel nawetamaj pa ruwi' re coronavirus ja re'

12.cak: Xa niq'axaj ri' ja ri nk'iyär

13.cak: Re itzel yab'il re' niq'äx ri' chi kikojol re winaqi' rik'in ri ak'axëj.

19.cak: Nuq'axaj ri yab'il ruma re taq tz'uj ya'

20.cak: Toq yatat'ixäm chunaqaj jun chïk winäq ri a k'axäj nb'iyin ruma ri' k'atzinel chi:

25.cak: Rik'in re' kan man jun ruk'ayewal yatojb'är chuqa' yatat'ixäm, xa ye'ato' konojel ri e k'o chi anaqaj.

28.cak: Ruma ri' k'atzinel nakusaj jun tz'apib'äl chi'aj

29.cak: Rik'in re yab'il re' man ruk'amon ta nib'an moloj, man ütz ta ri natun awi'.

30.cak: Rik'in jub'a' e k'o winaqi' man e yawa' ta po k'o chi  nikichajij ki' .

31.cak: E k'o winaqi' kik'wan chïk ri yab'il po man kan ta nikik'ut, man rik'in wi ri' nikiq'axaj ri yab'il chike ch'aqa chïk.

32.cak: Ri winaqi' e yawa'i' nikiya' kik'axäj pakiwi' re chuxtäq re'...

33.cak: Re pitz'b'äl e k'o pa nima'q taq jay

43.cak: Chuqa' yayawäj wi man nana' ta nachop ri apaläj,

44.cak: Ke re' toq nak'än re yab'il re'.

47.cak: Re yab'il re xa nk'ïs el chikij ri chuxtäq k'a pa ka'i' oxi' nima'q ramaj,

48.cak: Ja' k'o chi ye'ach'äj ronojel chuxtäq rik'in ya' chuqa' xab'on richin yeköm re yab'il re'.

51.cak: Ruma ri' yalan k'atzinel chi niqab'än re'

52.cak: Mani nachäp ri apaläj. Wi xa rik'in jub'a' xachäp, k'o chi nach'äj jeb'el rik'in ya' chuqa' rik'in xab'on.

57.cak: Tach'aja' jeb'el ri aq'a', yatane' k'a nab'ixaj na ka'i' mul ri "jeb'el xk'o a juna'.

61.cak: Ütz ruch'ajik ' ronojel rij ri aq'a'.

62.cak: Wi ri tz'apib'äl achi' k'iy mul yan xakusaj k'o chi nak'äq el, k'o chi nakusaj chïk jun k'aka'.

63.cak: Wi rik'in jub'a' xachäp rij ri tz'apib'äl, mani naxib'ïj awi', xa k'o chi nach'äj ri aq'a' rik'in ya' chuqa' xab'on.

64.cak: Chuqa' mani nach'op rij ri tz'ap'b'äl.

66.cak: Nk'ase' ri yab'il chirij ri tz'apib'äl chi'aj wi xa kan k'iy mul nakusaj.

67.cak: Re yab'il re' xab'akuchi' nik'oje' wi', xa rik'in jub'a' nasïk' pe.

72.cak: Mani ye'achäp ri awäch, ri axikïn chuqa' ri atza'm.

74.cak: Kan takanoj jun aq'omanel richin yatutzir.

78.cak: ¿Achike ruk'amon niqab'än richin man niqak'än ta re Coronavirus?

79.cak: ¿Achike ruk'amon niqab'än richin man niqak'än ta re Coronavirus?

93.cak: ¿Richin man niqak'än ta ri coronavirus k'o chi niqakusaj?

94.cak: ¿Richin man niqak'än ta ri coronavirus k'o chi niqakusaj?
